tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compost_quality_control (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  compost_batch_id INT,
  maturity_level DECIMAL,
  testing_date DATE,
  testing_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sample_id INT, 
    test_name TEXT, 
    test_date DATE, 
    test_result TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE compost_tests( 
  test_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  compost_id INT, 
  test_type VARCHAR(50), 
  testing_date DATE, 
  tester_name VARCHAR(50), 
  test_result VARCHAR(50) 
);
